name: program-tracker
description: A Node.js, React, MongoDB web app with a fast, minimalist UI for easy program tracking and long-term progress aggregation.

scripts.watch-js: babel public/javascript/babel/B_httpRequest.js --watch --out-file public/javascript/httpRequest.js & babel public/javascript/babel/B_log.js --watch --out-file public/javascript/log.js & babel public/javascript/babel/B_main.js --watch --out-file public/javascript/main.js & babel public/javascript/babel/B_exerciseData.js --watch --out-file public/javascript/exerciseData.js & babel public/javascript/babel/B_getUserAssets.js --watch --out-file public/javascript/getUserAssets.js & babel public/javascript/babel/_DEV --watch --out-file public/javascript/DEV.js

author: Zachary Long
